name: Just A Dream (itch) (Feathers95)
description:
Play as Bon with his trusty red cloak, and run away from the nightmare demon that haunts him. Collect and remember happy memories to fend the creature off, but beware. This chase never ends.

Just A Dream is a simple 2D platforming endless runner game created by myself and TheJackXBL and was created over the span of a week for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1.
